Articles.Content:
False...HUe

The user below me is sick

False. I'm quite healthy.

The user below me is aboard the hype train.

True

The user below me knows how to glitch out the game

Sometimes I have trouble figuring out how NOT to glitch the game out

The user below me owns a telescope.

Alas, I do not own a telescope (except in KSP, I've got quite a nice telescope in High Kerbin Orbit)

The user below me is a regular browser of imgur (lurker, Glorious, it doesn't matter).

We obviously haven't met before. I'd tell you my relations with imgur if you weren't so creepy about it.

The user below me enjoys arranging VG music, as I do.

False

The user below me will not get 1.0 when its released but will wait a few months.

False

The user below me has just been to an ANZAC Day Dawn Service.

False, the heck is that?

The user below me loves the ROUND-8

True!!!!

the user below me is a regular forum user.

True.

The user below me would not like to go to space.

Super-Highly-inevitably FALSE!!!

The user below me has not explored the Mohole and came out alive

True. I've never even been there.

The user below me uses Dropbox

I do have Dropbox, but I'm actively using Google Drive now.

The user below me is an avid card game player.

I like cards but I don't play often enough to call myself avid.

The user below me has ridden a train.

Both a real train and the HypeTrain.

The user below me has a car.

Can't even drive.

The user below me has killed Jeb over 10 times (or is danny/xactar).

True after figuring out kerbal's heads are rubber.

The user below is a fan of SpaceX

Yep!

The user below me has posted previously on this page.

True.

The user below me has never managed to land on Eve and come back to Kerbin.

Never even in its SOI, should go interplanetary at 1.0.

The user below me cannot make an SSTO

Lol, true. Look at my description under my name xD

The user under me has never gone to Laythe.

False, been there and returned.

The user below me has not played the RealismOverhaul suite of mods.

Nope to cpu and ram intensive

the user below me can't wait till the 27

There's going to be a 27.0? Great support squad!

Sarcasm aside, yep, hypetrain for 1.0.

The user below me will die. (note that this is not a prediction or threat)
